dedicated.server.Rtm.description: Servers statistics sent by RTM (Real Time Monitoring)

needsUpdate.description: You need to update RTM script on your server

status.description: indicates wether burstable bandwidth is currently active, allowing it to temporarily exceed the normally included bandwidth.OvhToInternet amount, within the limits indicated by the burst.capacity item. It can also be inactiveLocked when temporarily disabled due to overuse, capping it to the included non-burstable bandwidth capacity of bandwidth.OvhToInternet

dedicated.server.BackupStorageCapacityEn.description: Different backup storage capacity in gigabytes

inputQuotaUsed.description: Monthly input traffic consumed this month

outputQuotaUsed.description: Monthly output traffic consumed this month

possibleRenewPeriod.description: All the possible renew period of your service in month

personal.description: Names list of yours installation templates compatibles with this server

optionRequired.description: Which option is required to order an USB key

orderable.description: Is USB keys orderable for this server

capacity.description: Orderable USB keys capacity in gigabytes

activated.description: true, if IPMI is ivailable on this server

dedicated.server.RtmPci.description: A structure describing informations about server PCI devices

diskGroups.description: details about the groups of disks in the server

defaultHardwareRaidType.description: Default hardware raid type configured on this server

numberOfProcessors.description: number of processors in this dedicated server

usbKeys.description: Capacity of the USB keys installed on your server, if any

defaultHardwareRaidSize.description: Default hardware raid size for this server

virtualMachineName.description: Friendly name of your Virtual Machine behind this IP/MAC

ftp.description: Wether to allow the FTP protocol for this ACL

cifs.description: Wether to allow the CIFS (SMB) protocol for this ACL

optionRequired.description: Which option is required to order this type of IP

number.description: Total number of prefixes that can be routed to this server

ipNumber.description: Total number of IP that can be routed to this server

included.description: Are those IP included with your offer

dedicated.server.IpmiAccessTypeEnum.description: Distinct way to acces a KVM IPMI session

error.description: Error details if state is error

dedicated.server.UsbKeyCapacityEnum.description: Different USB key capacity in gigabytes

capacities.description: Backup storage orderable capacities in gigabytes

orderable.description: Is a backup storage is orderable for this server

diskSpanSize.description: Size of disk spans on RAID

dedicated.server.RtmMemory.description: A structure describing informations about server memory

dedicated.server.smsAlert.description: Monitoring SMS alert details, This service is currently not supported for servers at BHS

toHour.description: Daily hour start time for SMS notification

fromHour.description: Daily hour end time for SMS notification

dedicated.server.RtmLoad.description: A structure describing informations about server load

loadavg1.description: Load average in the last 1 minute

loadavg5.description: Load average in the last 5 minutes

loadavg15.description: Load average in the last 15 minutes

processCount.description: Number of processes using or waiting for CPU time

dedicated.server.CacheTTLEnum.description: Time to live in minutes for cache

service.RenewType.description: Map a possible renew for a specific service

forced.description: The service forced to be renewed

deleteAtExpiration.description: The service will be deleted at expiration

dedicated.server.HardwareSpecificationsD.description: A structure describing informations about server disks

numberOfDisks.description: number of disks in this group

diskType.description: type of the disk (SSD, SATA, SAS, ...)

raidController.description: raid controller, if any, managing this group of disks

dedicated.server.HardwareRaidProfile.description: A structure describing the server's hardware RAID configuration

dedicated.server.RtmConnection.description: A structure describing informations about opened sockets on the server

cmdline.description: Complete command line used for starting this process

username.description: Username used to start the process

license.WindowsSqlVersionEnum.description: All SQL Server versions for Windows products

noRaid.description: true if you want to install only on the first disk

sshKeyName.description: The name of ssh key to install

language.description: install language for ovh install choice

useSpla.description: true if you want to install windows with your spla license

postInstallationScriptLink.description: the url to your custom install script

customHostname.description: Personnal hostname to use in server reinstallation

installSqlServer.description: true if you want to install windows with sql feature

postInstallationScriptReturn.description: the return of your script if everythings ok. Advice: your script should return a unique validation string in case of succes. A good example is "loh1Xee7eo OK OK OK UGh8Ang1Gu

useDistribKernel.description: true if you want to install with distrib kernel

softRaidDevices.description: Number of devices to use for system's software RAID

secondaryDns.SecondaryDNSNameServer.description: A structure describing informations about available nameserver for secondary dns

command.description: Complete command line used for starting this process

professionalUse.description: Does this server have professional use option

orderable.description: Is bandwidth orderable for this server
